医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
揭示血癌中 B 细胞成熟的机制根据西班牙癌症登记网络 (REDECAN) 的最新预测，明年西班牙将有 400 多人被诊断出患有 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (B-ALL)，其中 80% 是 14 岁以下儿童）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Unraveling-the-mechanisms-of-B-cell-maturation-in-blood-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Unraveling-the-mechanisms-of-B-cell-maturation-in-blood-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=418d7523-a38f-464d-a007-92cfb3d7b49e Mon, 21 Oct 2024 09:52:10 -0400 Unraveling the mechanisms of B-cell maturation in blood cancer
新指南重点关注通过健康生活预防首次中风健康的生活方式，例如良好的营养、戒烟和锻炼身体，以及常规健康检查和通过药物控制心血管疾病和中风的危险因素，可以帮助预防个人首次中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-guidelines-focus-on-preventing-first-中风-through-healthy-living.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-guidelines-focus-on-preventing-first-中风-through-healthy-living.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e063904a-5d3e-460a-9791-197ef4a4b079 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 09:46:45 -0400 New guidelines focus on preventing first strokes through healthy living
研究为 KRAS 基因在胰腺癌和结直肠癌中的行为提供了新的线索赫尔辛基大学最近的研究为 KRAS 基因在两种最致命的癌症（胰腺癌和结直肠癌）中的行为提供了新的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Research-sheds-new-light-on-the-behavior-of-KRAS-gene-in-pancreatic-and-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Research-sheds-new-light-on-the-behavior-of-KRAS-gene-in-pancreatic-and-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcb6f6be-55ae-49ed-bef9-f52a48db04c0 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 08:28:05 -0400 Research sheds new light on the behavior of KRAS gene in pancreatic and colorectal cancer
民意调查显示蛋白质补充剂在青少年中越来越受欢迎蛋白棒、奶昔和蛋白粉在成年人中越来越受欢迎，但许多青少年也可能会加入这股潮流。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Poll-reveals-rising-popularity-of- Protein-supplements-among-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Poll-reveals-rising-popularity-of- Protein-supplements-among-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c8d508a-dfa9-45d1-9a1b-56fe9bc4caf7 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 08:19:46 -0400 Poll reveals rising popularity of protein supplements among teens
研究人员确定了与大脑体积和疾病的遗传联系在一项有史以来最大规模的 DNA 和大脑体积研究中，研究人员发现了 254 个基因变异，它们塑造了“大脑深处”的关键结构，包括控制记忆、运动技能、成瘾行为等的结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Researchers-identify-genic-links-to-brain-volume-and-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Researchers-identify-genic-links-to-brain-volume-and-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f51ff0e6-1052-4c29-8e56-5e967ee6d56b Mon, 21 Oct 2024 08:11:08 -0400 Researchers identify genetic links to brain volume and disorders
较高的饮食质量与降低前列腺癌等级重新分类的风险相关《美国医学会杂志肿瘤学》的一项研究将饮食质量与前列腺癌分级重新分类风险联系起来，表明更健康的饮食可能会减少早期病例的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Higher-diet-quality-linked-with-reduced-risk-of-prostate-cancer-grade-reclassification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Higher-diet-quality-linked-with-reduced-risk-of-prostate-cancer-grade-reclassification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5321fced-d200-4d8d-bdec-4428400c3c6c Mon, 21 Oct 2024 07:55:00 -0400 Higher diet quality associated with reduced risk of prostate cancer grade reclassification
有氧运动可增强乳腺癌患者的认知功能许多接受化疗的女性都会经历短期和长期的记忆、注意力和/或思考能力下降——通常称为“化疗脑”或“脑雾”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Aerobic-exercise-boosts-cognitive-function-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Aerobic-exercise-boosts-cognitive-function-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebf0177e-050c-4c01-97f4-b818307bdf40 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 07:48:00 -0400 Aerobic exercise boosts cognitive function in breast cancer patients
多倍体在癌症中可能是一把双刃剑多倍体是一种细胞比通常的“二倍体”细胞含有更多遗传物质副本的状态，“二倍体”细胞含有两个副本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Polyploidy-can-be-a-double-edged-sword-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Polyploidy-can-be-a-double-edged-sword-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aac63233-56b3-4946-84ea-f27b6de0da34 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 07:44:00 -0400 Polyploidy can be a double-edged sword in cancer
研究揭示术后镇痛存在种族偏见根据在 ANESTHESIOLOGY® 2024 年会上提出的研究，在从大手术中恢复期间，黑人患者可能比白人患者不太可能接受某些多模式镇痛方案，而更有可能接受口服阿片类药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Study-reveals-racial-bias-in-postsurgical-analgesia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Study-reveals-racial-bias-in-postsurgical-analgesia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cfddfcf-f0db-4986-891e-e62cb4768004 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 07:34:19 -0400 Study reveals racial bias in postsurgical analgesia
埃及获得历史性的无疟疾认证世界卫生组织 (WHO) 已认证埃及已消除疟疾，对于这个拥有一亿多居民的国家来说，这是一个重要的公共卫生里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Egypt-achieves-historic-malaria-free-certification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Egypt-achieves-historic-malaria-free-certification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddc33000-0c1f-4e29-8555-8f253560568f Mon, 21 Oct 2024 07:12:46 -0400 Egypt achieves historic malaria-free certification
